pkgmetadata.longdescription: Monte Carlo Goodness-of-Fit Tests for Stochastic Block Models // Performing goodness-of-fit tests for stochastic block models used to fit network data. Among the three variants discussed in Karwa et al. (2023) doi:10.1093/jrsssb/qkad084, goodness-of-fit test has been performed for the Erdos-Renyi (ER) and Beta versions.
